work.title: CoderDojo - Chapter Founder & Volunteer Mentor
work.description:
Co-founded South Brunswick CoderDojo chapter
Taught Python through text adventure games
Taught Python through creating bots using discord.py
Taught HTML/CSS through making websites based on student interests
 
Discontinued due to lack of venue

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: Developed my first fully fledged website using Next.js, a React framework, along with Typescript and TailwindCSS for styling. All skill data and experience data is loading dynamically from json files. Learned and developed the first version of the website within a week.
